Poor Economy Threatens Lawn Tennis Poor Economy Threatens Lawn Tennis

The present hardship plaguing the nation has forced several sponsors of junior lawn tennis champi- onships to abandon the game. The present hardship plaguing the nation has forced several sponsors of junior lawn tennis champi- onships to abandon the game.
